website_summaries.verdict: This variety of emu oil is a fine product for healthier nails, aching muscles, and itchy skin, and its simple yet convenient hand pump makes this an even more valuable product.
pros: Reduces dark spots, scars, and skin discoloration
cons: Some emu oil products are unscented, but InstaNatural’s has an unusual scent until it dries

customer_reviews.title: Quality emu oil - seems to work for the purpose that I need it for
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery last year and my hairline thinned out a bit. I heard that emu oil really helps when you're trying to repair and regrow your hairline, so I've been using it for a few weeks. The insta natural brand is the third brand I've tried, and it's the best. It arrives professionally packed. The bottle is sturdy. The oil itself has a great consistency: nice and thick. This brand has been the best, so this is the one that has made it to auto-ship status. My hairline is slowly growing back, and I also use it for my skin now.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: HEALING PROPERTIES
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this product to use in a recipe to make your eye lashes grow. However, I had also read it can help relieve inflammation (not chronic though) so I started rubbing it into the strained tendons around my knee. Within 2 days, the pain was significantly less and eventually, 80% better and I can now climb stairs again. This is a really nice product and I will be placing another order. I really think it helps with tendonitis pain. Update: It’s been months since I first purchased this Emu Oil. I love adding a little lavender or peppermint oil to this before applying at bedtime. So nice!
customer_reviews.author: J. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other brands of emu oil, but find this one to be the best. I use it everywhere, from nose to toes. I am in my 50s and am a post menopausal woman. I also have very dry, sensitive skin that is also prone to breakouts. This oil has been a godsend. My skin is much softer and stronger since I started using it. Although I wouldn't swear to it, I also think the claims of anti inflammatory agents in the oil are true. Given the large size of the bottle, it is also a bargain. I'd highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Niinipini

customer_reviews.title: Emu oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil, it makes my skin super soft and I don't have to use much of it. I also use it on my scalp, it is so soothing. A perfect skin moisturizer.😊 I am 44 years old I take great pride in taking care of my skin, this oil compliments my skin well.
customer_reviews.author: peanut gang

customer_reviews.title: It's working!
customer_reviews.text: In the past few years I experienced hair loss and I tried endless number of hair supplements but nothing really worked. I purchased this oil with little hope. I put it on my scalp (just a little and it gets absorbed quickly) in the night for a few days and twice at week I coupled it with castor oil. The first week 50% less hair in the shower and this week just a few strands. Impressive. I will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann I.

customer_reviews.title: It works on Knee pain
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this Emu oil because I had twisted my knee and nothing was working! I read up on natural remedies and came across Emu Oil. I had some Fro Butter with Emu Oil in it and started using that on my knee. I could tell that the pain was going away. I purchased this Emu Oil so that I could get the full strength and mu knee is getting better. I will continue to use the Emu Oil and I have been telling everyone that I am using Emu Oil for my knee, something they never heard of. It is working!
customer_reviews.author: Mew0116

customer_reviews.title: But what I can say is that this is an AWESOME conditioner for your hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to (hopefully) encourage hair growth and it's too soon to say whether it's helped with that. But what I can say is that this is an AWESOME conditioner for your hair. I have long, naturally curly hair that has been really frizzy lately and no hair product, oils, or condioner I've tried have helped. I started rubbing the Emu oil into my scalp (and leaving it in overnight) the night before shampooing and have been amazed after even the first use at how smooth my curls are now. My frizz problem is completely solved and my hair couldn't be more healthy looking. It's never ever looked this great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells gross
customer_reviews.text: I received the oil today and from description the oil should not smell. Mine smells pretty bad, like old oil that’s expired. I don’t see anywhere expiration date or anything and the item cannot be returned. I am very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: The product is super soft and not messy or greasy
customer_reviews.text: The product is super soft and not messy or greasy. I put it on before going to bed. My skin is soft in the morning. I have noticed the wrinkles on my forehead are less visible. Will definitely continue to use the product. I am 38 years old and using this product will definitely keep your skin looking fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Sscs

customer_reviews.title: It works up nicely and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I used the Emu oil for a scar from knee replacement on both of my knees. I use about 3 drops on each knee and massage the scar tissue and the scar line. I’ve just started but I already like it better than Vitamin E. It states oily for about 5 hours, so I use it at night. My left knee was done in December 2018 and the scar is still visible but it is helping that knee as well.
customer_reviews.author: AngelWings

customer_reviews.title: Rich product and excellent healer
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE this product! It is very think and rich which is why I love it. I actually use it on the face as a deep moisturizer and also under mask in my treatment room. It is an excellent addition to my current skincare regimen. The company is excellent and the products are pure, effective and very reasonably priced. I just ordered 5 other products to try in my facial treatments.
customer_reviews.author: M. Groves

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional oil
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I tried straight Emu oil and I love it. It was exceptional at moisturizing around my nose during cold with a sore nose. Also it not cause me to break out. I bought the product to use with oils to help penitent the skin better. I feel it is effective. My Young Living Deep Relief oil is more potent when I apply the Emu oil first.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Cline

customer_reviews.title: Made in the U.S.A!!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked around for a quality grade of Emu Oil that was made in the U.S.A. and was free from toxic ingredients. This InstaNatural one fit the bill. So far, so good. I added 3/4 teaspoon of this to an essential oil roller ball along with almond oil, copaiba and wintergreen to make a pain relief roll-on. I had read that Emu Oil is supposed to help oils penetrate deeper into skin layers. My husband is very pleased with my roller ball recipe, and I attribute it's success partly to the Emu Oil.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie C

customer_reviews.title: Everything as advertised and MORE
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this emu oil. It is wonderful I use it daily on my skin and hair. I especially like how it has strengthened my hair. I stopped coloring and let my natural color come in. I was delighted the natural color is white. White hair calls for special care or it yellows with colors in gel or other products. I only need to apply this sheer, scented, moisturizing emu oil and my hair maintains perfect tones.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Francine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I’m finishing my second bottle of this wonderful oil and couldn’t be happier. I love how soft my skin is now and I also love that it doesn’t have strong scent. I’m very particular about the products that I put on my skin as they are absorbed into our bloodstream. Most products are full of chemicals I can’t pronounce so I sure don’t want those in my body! I love this light unscented oil and it lasts such a long time. I use just one pump to cover my entire face so this large bottle lasts for months!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Hamidi

customer_reviews.title: Wow so apparently I can’t even return this emu oil ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow so apparently I can’t even return this emu oil. I thought I’d try another brand for my sons eczema (loved the first one had no problem) but when I got this brand it says it’s refined AND to keep out of reach of children? If it’s as organic as it says why would I need to keep it away from my child and WHY does it need to be refined? I will use it on my self and buy my son the omega 369 emu oil that is unrefined and safe for my sons eczema!
customer_reviews.author: Shaundra smith

customer_reviews.title: Yup I'm hooked for life!
customer_reviews.text: I am in my late 40's and have been using this for a couple of weeks now. Twice Daily, face, neck, hands, elbows, feet. I have OK skin texture to start with, but I do have some light age spots and minor Redness. Some wrinkles especially around the mouth area. I see major improvements in over all skin texture and color. Wrinkles seem to be softer and less noticeable. My skin is like silk! I swear it eases my tendinitis pain in elbows. So I'm hooked and will continue using it forever! I have tons of The department store creams. I mean all the top brands and this is now my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: liftman

customer_reviews.title: Emu oil is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: It's super moisturizing and gives my skin a glow. When I use products to treat acne on my face, I use a tiny amount to keep problem areas from getting dry. I also use it on my underarms, before applying my natural deodorant and use after shaving anywhere. I am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: See_Alycia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying a little goes a long way. I purchased this product in 11/2016. It is now April 2017. I wanted to use it for a little while first. This is a great facial moisturizer and skin toner. My husband asked me what I did to my face as my under eye circles have diminished tremendously but not totally gone. My skin is soft and smooth. I still get the occasional break out as I suffer from adult acne. Goes on oily at first but absorbs into the skin very quickly. Just ordered my 2nd bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Kita R.

customer_reviews.title: No returns? Should tell a buyer all they need to know.
customer_reviews.text: Since I can’t use this product because it will not pump out and I can not return (everyone should really be careful to read- I miss read it, shame on me) this product is useless to me. I am a fan of emu oil and it can work, however to buy from a company that will Not support a platform that backs their product by allowing returns, should tell buyers everything that they need to know. As an avid emu oil user, I was willing to give this company a try. However, there are plenty out there (right here on Amazon) that are willing to back their product by allowing for returns.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Great for me and my pets!
customer_reviews.text: I like to use this on my neck and face. Usually anything I use causes irritation, but this makes my dry skin feel healthy and soft. An added bonus is that it makes pilling my dog a snap. I just put a drop on the pill and pop it in her mouth. She loves the oil, swallows the pill, and happily licks my fingers afterwards. My cat also loves to lick my skin after I use the oil so I'm pretty sure if I need to pill him, the oil would work quite well.
customer_reviews.author: barbedout

customer_reviews.title: Great for hands!
customer_reviews.text: I had so much problem with my hands bleeding and/or bruising with the slightest little bump - thinking a combination of age and blood pressure meds. I ran the idea of emu oil by my dermatologist and she said "sure". I've been using it for a few weeks now and the difference is amazing. Still bumping my hands but at the most a little bruise that heals really quickly. I use it once or twice a day. Also makes my hand really soft.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: My curly hair loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best hair oils for hair. My hair eats this oil like food. I've tried other oils from castor to argan and for some reason my hair loves this oil the most. I have very fine and tightly curly coiled hair. I did try it as a face oil and it broke me out and was itchy the entire time on my skin. I do have oily skin so most oils will break me out. The only oil I've found so far that is good on my skin and does not cause irritation is grapeseed oil.
customer_reviews.author: Shontae H.

customer_reviews.title: New to Emu Oil
customer_reviews.text: I put it in a roller bottle with castor oil and coconut oil to use on my eyelashes. They are so short. This has helped with the dry skin at the corner of my eyes. My lashes are softer and longer. I do not know how it should smell as I have never bought it before. But I am happy with this one, so I am sure I will buy again. I don't just spray it on but it comes with a sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend for the price and quality of this product for ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was the same consistency and smell as another purchase of emu oil on Amazon, just at a lower price cost. It goes on smoothly and softens the same as the other product. I would definitely recommend for the price and quality of this product for anyone looking to purchase emu oil. It has so many beneficial uses, like skin softening, conditioning your hair or removing make-up. InstaNatural has some great products and this is definitely one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer57

customer_reviews.title: Works great on scars!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this product to see what it could do for patches of dry skin (took care of them with no trouble) but in the process I also applied it to a couple of 1-2 year old surgical scars and am amazed by the results! The older scar was somewhat faded to begin with and has now really started to disappear, and the newer one, which was lumpy and bright pink, is now much smoother and lighter in color. I've only been using the oil for a couple of weeks and only use a few drops at a time - very fast and positive results!
customer_reviews.author: DanaK

customer_reviews.title: I love this oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil,I have Fibromyalgia and it amazing how much it helps.I rub it on every night to my thighs and leg muscles and anywhere else i may need it.I will not be caught without a bottle. I have tried ALOT of things for my pain but this is the BEST.You can not buy anything in the store that is this powerful.You only have to use a really small amount,and it absorbs fast and is not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I went through chemo had real dry skin and this works great not very expensive great product
customer_reviews.text: I went through chemo had real dry skin and this works great not very expensive great product
customer_reviews.author: Mari Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Great for Burns!
customer_reviews.text: I burned my arm canning tomato sauce (jar exploded) and this oil was recommended to me. It was absolutely the BEST! I have become the biggest fan of emu oil. Doesn't smell or sting at all. It goes on smoothly and really helped when it started to itch as it was healing. I really think it made a huge difference in the healing process and will recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: WebGirl

customer_reviews.title: Best I ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product...I am using it on my face and hands and have noticed forehead wrinkles disappeared. My skin has a healthy glow now after only a week. This oil is great for fading stretch marks too....mine were over 35 years old and have faded completely! This works better than anything I've tried for skin problems. I also use it on my scalp to aid in thickening. I recommend this to anyone looking for a great skin care product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've just started using it but so far I love it. I tend to have very oily skin but this doesn't make it worse.
customer_reviews.author: UnapologeticallyLoving

customer_reviews.title: Winter Hand Relief
customer_reviews.text: I have a very rare skin condition & winter is horrible for me because it's so dry. I have problems with the skin around my finger nails cracking & if you've ever felt your pulse in your finger tips, you know it's not pleasant. I've taken to using a sugar scrub in the evenings, then applying the Emu oil & finally sealing my hands with a cream like Eucerin. Viola! My hands aren't cracked & pulsing with pain. I would recommend this to anyone who wants relief from winter hands!
customer_reviews.author: LScott

customer_reviews.title: ... about a week now and overall I'd say I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this oil about a week now and overall I'd say I'm happy with it. Last year during the polar vortex, my skin suffered terribly. I resorted to using vaseline on my face. But we all know that vaseline leaves behind a shiny appearance. By time I got to work, the shininess would be gone. With the emu oil, I don't have to worry about the shine at all. It quickly absorbs in my skin and a little goes a long way. I also used some on my extremely dry heels. It didn't moisturize as expected, but I did notice that my toe nails and cuticles looked a lot better. I'll definitely keep using this.
customer_reviews.author: Tsquared

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a little more oily than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Because of it being oily, it doesn't seem to sink in as well as I thought it would. I can't put it on at night because it gets all over the pillow cases when I go to sleep. However it's not too bad right after a morning shower and under makeup.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for acne/acne scars/dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I started using it after I went through an entire year of dealing with horrible cystic acne. I found out that not only am I allergic to many different foods, but I also have skin allergies to many different ingredients present in skincare products. My dermatologist recommended emu oil to moisturize my face and help with the acne scars. I have to admit, I was a bit skeptical, but it has honestly worked wonders on my skin! My scars started fading much quicker after I started using it, and my skin has never been this soft and smooth. The bottle and pump is also very easy to store and use.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: ... for approximately 2 weeks and so far I really like it. I'm using it as a moisturizer on ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for approximately 2 weeks and so far I really like it. I'm using it as a moisturizer on my face after using Dr. Woods Liquid Black Soap. Together they are working wonders for my face. It's very soft but so far I haven't seen any decrease in the lines and wrinkles ... but then Rome wasn't built in a day and neither were my lines and wrinkles! This is a good company in which to deal and they seem to care about their customers. I asked a couple of questions and got replies very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rescued ByThe Lamb

customer_reviews.title: I also have been using it on a pretty severe burn and it helped heal and protect the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is pure emu oil and is very light and silky, unlike other emu oils I have used before. It has no odor whatsoever and does not clog pores. I use this on my face every day, just a very light application, before using anything else. I also have been using it on a pretty severe burn and it helped heal and protect the new skin. My previous brand had an eye-dropper applicator, which was rather messy. This is in a pump and delivers just the right amount with no mess. Excellent product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: If You Get An Outbreak of Shingles, Use This Emu Oil!
customer_reviews.text: My husband recently contracted Shingles and a friend of mine suggested using Emu oil on the outbreak. I ordered a bottle immediately and received it in less than 5 days. We started applying it several times a day to his rash and got amazing results! The oil not only helped the Shingles outbreak, but also helped relieve the awful pain associated with Shingles.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K. Collier

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: I've used emu oil for years and this is my new favorite. Scent is subtle, consistency is nice & absorbs easily. Only thing is a little goes a long way & the pump disperses a lot. LOL, now that I left the humid South for Iowa it's no longer an issue cuz my hands need it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant Oder but I’ll take that.
customer_reviews.text: This oil is great to relieve sore muscles if you can stand the smell. It’s not a strong oder but definitely not a pleasant one. I also like to put it on my temples to help with headaches and on the back of my neck to help with tension headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love emu oil for my face! As a 40-something year old woman who tries to minimize exposure to chemicals (especially on my skin, daily), this emu oil is a fantastic face moisturizer. Thick enough to be hydrating, but not oily or greasy or thick. Use it after your shower and wake up with soft and happy skin. My mom swears that it has lightened her age spots, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Dunford

customer_reviews.title: Beware can't return -- unacceptable scent and absorption
customer_reviews.text: Received packaged box with bottle and dropper. Oil smells like baked chicken fat. Applied on inner arm for half a day, test spot remains shinny and greasy, didn't absorb. Thought emu oil penetrates... Would like to return, and found out can't. Missed the fine print during purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mag_prime

customer_reviews.title: Scar Reducer!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for skin care. I use it on the edges of ulcers I have on my feet due to an illness. Emu oil is GREAT for reducing the appearance of scars with the proper tolerated pressure applied with this product. Its a little runny so be careful on how much you use. A little goes a LONG way!
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: but I really feel as if they could be much worse. I feel that while this can't prevent stretch ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while on my belly during pregnancy to tame stretch marks. I am just now getting faint marks in my 7th month, but I really feel as if they could be much worse. I feel that while this can't prevent stretch marks, it has definitely helped to moisturize my skin so they wouldn't be as bad.
customer_reviews.author: LBG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would help with vitiligo but it didn’t. It is however, very moisturizing soothing and of good quality. Smell is a little weird but that’s a given considering it’s emu oil and it’s nothing a little essential oil or perfume can’t mask.
customer_reviews.author: OrganicLove

customer_reviews.title: What I especially love is the new packaging and pump
customer_reviews.text: An esthetician introduced me to emu oil some years ago, and I have since moved to another city. I would usually buy from her, but without her nearby I decided to turn to amazon. This oil is of similar (great) quality. It has definitely helped with keeping my sensitive skin hydrated throughout the colder, dryer months. What I especially love is the new packaging and pump. I can shake up the product if it has settled a bit, and little to no oil comes out from around the pump, which was my experience with the old packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: But after buying this product I am seeing better results and am using it for my knees
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Emu oil for a while to help get rid of scars. It works very well. But after buying this product I am seeing better results and am using it for my knees, skin and hair with positive results. It's really helped my knee pain which I have been struggling with for a while from too much running. I have also found this product as a great remedy for scars and as a rich moisturizer for my skin and hair which is thick and curly. I would highly recommend this product to anyone in the market for Emu oil,
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Alpan

customer_reviews.title: saves me a bunch of money and the potential of the trauma of a bad experience with cosmetic surgery
customer_reviews.text: There are not enough stars to express how I feel about this emu oil! I find it miraculous, taking ten years from my face.... I am thrilled. Thank you!!!!!!!!!! saves me a bunch of money and the potential of the trauma of a bad experience with cosmetic surgery.. I appreciate your product and recommend it to men and women.... great results and saves me a bunch of money and the potential of the trauma of a bad experience with cosmetic surgery!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kohr-Blinn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for dry chapped skin!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this emu oil. Has slight odor but that is normal for emu oil and if you mix it with a little lotion you can’t smell it at all. I just ordered my second bottle. I live in Alaska so it’s great for my dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Emu Oil
customer_reviews.text: This emu oil appears to be working and I like the consistency. The reason why I gave it four stars is, because I do not like the pump. I cannot seem to get it to work. I have to pull the top off to use this product. It’s inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: RBJ

customer_reviews.title: great oil, pump never worked
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizing oil that leaves my skin super soft. But the pump came broken. Bummer because how are you supposed to keep this oil clean without a pump?
customer_reviews.author: flower

customer_reviews.title: I love Oils
customer_reviews.text: love this oil. Use for pain relief with a mix of arnica, rosemary, clove, birch, marjoram, oregano, and CBD oils made at home. Also blend some apricot and almond. I love essential oils and making my own mixes. Down side is once you get to the bottom it solidifly a bit and it's hard to get out with the squirt top, but I love the easy squirt top.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeAddict

customer_reviews.title: good product for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this mostly on my face before a moisturizer. It seems to hold moisture in my skin better than the rose hip oil I had been using. It absorbs quickly. In very dry cold weather, I have also used emu oil on an itchy back instead of usual body lotion. The emu oil seems more healing of dry and irritated areas. I have quite sensitive skin and this product has caused no problems, irritation or redness or blemishes. It is easy on the skin. There is no odor either.
customer_reviews.author: sallly

customer_reviews.title: Entire box opened, product tampered with...
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package as soon as it arrived--only to discover the box was opened (bottom and top). The plastic seal was tampered with and the top was screwed off halfway. Not taking any chances....HIGHLY dissappointed and will return the item.
customer_reviews.author: makeitagreatday

customer_reviews.title: Natural product with good performance
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to help with my daughter’s acne scarring. She has only used for a short time so it’s hard to say the results. She doesn’t like the smell. Me on the other hand don’t care that it smells natural and not like her crappy perfume products. The more natural the better for me. I have been using it for my age spots and seems to be lightening them. Also I have been putting on elbows and really dry areas like my hands and cuticles and really holds nicely even more than when I used straight coconut oil. It’s a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dutcher

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I have always used a different brand of Emu oil, for whatever reason I decided to give this one a try.....it has made my skin break out in HUGE pimples everywhere. I think it's safe to say my skin does not like this oil at all.
customer_reviews.author: andrew runolfson

customer_reviews.title: Soften lines and all Rouch Skin.
customer_reviews.text: I adore the supple that Emu oil offers the skin from layers deep. If restores and brings strongly supports youthful tone and texture. Delay the signs of aging quite a bit especially for those that go in the sun. this is a must for the PM or as often as you can. This particular brand is my favorite. Much more authentic and pure that other brands I have used. Also does not smell.
customer_reviews.author: Purchases

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful.
customer_reviews.text: I was using a more expensive brand of emu oil with great results, but I was looking for something more affordable and found this. The ratings are good, so I purchased it. It smells REALLY bad. Like old oil. It's nauseating. And I didn't even notice that it's not returnable until after I received it. Guess I'll go back to my original brand.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Moore

customer_reviews.title: Soft, firm skin with lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the InstaNatural Emu Oil blend for almost a month and I have been receiving many compliments on my skin! I'm very happy with the product and my skin always feels moisturized. I'm a huge fan and I'm trying more products in their line to add to my skincare routine because I'm so happy with my results! XO :)
customer_reviews.author: H. Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth and light
customer_reviews.text: Love!! This oil is very smooth and not too oily. I use it on what it's for and it gets the job done. My son's skin is so dry I put this stuff on and it absorbs in like butter. Very smooth and light.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Parris

customer_reviews.title: shall see
customer_reviews.text: Emu oil is supposed to be one of the best oils. Its hard to find quality. I wish I found one that is organic. The smell is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I originally bought to use on my feet as I read it is good for plantar warts. Not only is my wart reduced, my nails on my hands have grown really long and strong and my cuticles are much better
customer_reviews.author: Onlineuk

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I had moles removed and use it on my scars. It smooths my skin - although it hasn't yet removed the scars.
customer_reviews.author: tlw

customer_reviews.title: I have some dry skin patches that I'm using this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have some dry skin patches that I'm using this for but I am also using it for pain relief. I have plantars fasciitis, a pinched nerve, torn ligaments, and arthritis in my foot. I hope that this helps, but is too soon to know for sure.
customer_reviews.author: skeeter`57

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful oil for irritated
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful oil for irritated, reactive skin. Has helped resolve facial skin redness and rosacea-like symptoms. Love that I can use it anywhere on my skin and it's gentle and non-irritating. I really like the pump bottle that gives small spritzes of the oil since you don't need a lot per application.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Non greasy and is easily absorbed.  Excellent for mature skin.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have bought Emu Oil. I was introduced to it by a friend, and I can assure you I am was not disappointed. I use it on my skin and hair. When applied it is rapidly absorbed an is not greasy. I recently fought 2 bottles, and has given one to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: claudette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Carrier oil
customer_reviews.text: Great oil for a good price. Helps with inflammation and is a great carrier oil.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Kauble

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this company. I love this emu oil..my complexion looks so much better after 2 weeks of use. I also use it on my nail beds/cuticles and my nails look better too. I also purchased the argan oil hair mask and love that also. The company sends you information about their product and how to use it properly. They even sent me some rose water free. I will definitely be purchasing more from Instanatural.
customer_reviews.author: isign

customer_reviews.title: ... my stretch marks and I almost wanna cry with joy because for once since I got this awful strips ...
customer_reviews.text: Am using this for my stretch marks and I almost wanna cry with joy because for once since I got this awful strips I feel hopeful that I will be able to wear a bikini again.
customer_reviews.author: rare

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing better for dry skin in my opinion. My hands have very thin skin because I am aging and there was actually a sore from my warn skin. However, the Emu oil saved the day and healed my hand in just a few days.I use it every evening at bedtime to promote the healing. The oil is pure and if you have any allergic skin conditions, emu oil is not likely to aggravate it as many cosmetics will with their preservatives and various chemicals additivies.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: pump cap doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I LOVEEE emu oil as a moisturizer and this is a good quality oil, however the pump cap doesnt work so when I went to pour some out of the bottle and into my hand, A LOT spilled out. It's since been transferred to another bottle, but I am pretty bummed at how much was lost.
customer_reviews.author: Ahayden

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I add it to my lotion sometimes ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I add it to my lotion sometimes or just put it on and it feels great on my skin! Will definately buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amber03297

customer_reviews.title: nothing like described
customer_reviews.text: isn't any better than the lotion i get at sprouts. leaves my hands & face greasy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vickery

customer_reviews.title: I suffer from super dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonders on my skin! I suffer from super dry skin, especially on my face, and after trying several different products (including other emu oil brands), I am SOOOO happy that I stumbled upon this brand! It's a great quality emu oil that I use mainly on my face and it leaves my skin feeling so soft and hydrated! I really recommend this product.. it has helped with not only my dryness, but also leaves my skin with this natural glow and surprisingly has helped with acne breakouts too! Great product that WORKS and has many wonderful skin benefits :))
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bitton

customer_reviews.title: Eases pain and clears and moisturizes skin.
customer_reviews.text: My skin is clear. No more acne. No more boils or hives or anything else.e My dry cracked skin is smooth. Even my son noticed after only 2 days use. I can sleep because a little oil eases pain in my neck, back, arms, legs and feet. I have been able to use less pain killers. The product is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Terrys gal

customer_reviews.title: Multitasking Oil!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping; Great product; Comes in dark bottle to keep in fresh. This is a great oil and can be used for so many different things! We currently use it for dry skin (cold, midwest weather!) ; it soaks right into the skin...doesn't feel overly greasy. I am looking forward to discovering all of its great uses.
customer_reviews.author: ktangelic

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: InstaNatural emu oil is great. I've tried a few other products purchased here on Amazon for a cheaper price and returned to InstaNatural. InstaNatural emu oil absorb better then the other products I've tried. I use it as a scalp and facial oil and my face is definitely less oily with it. Thanks InstaNatural for providing a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Gulley

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!! Worth the money$$$
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff my scars are healing and my skin cleared up in one day. Impressive. The value though, same price bigger bottle🤔. But very good over all. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: elle

customer_reviews.title: is the BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say.....InstaNatural's Emu Oil......is the BEST!!! I've been searching for best Emu Oil for my hair but I didn't get lucky because other products Emu Oil didn't work on my hair until I found InstaNatural's Emu Oil. Before my hair was dry but now, my hair is smooth, soft & shiny. It's amazing feeling. Excellent moisturizer. I didn't have to reapply it after using it, it absorbs quickly & just like that, smooth, soft & shiny. This Product is the next big thing & I will definitely come back because I'm seriously can't live without it. I will be forever customer to InstaNatural. Fast shipping & amazing service 8o) You make my day,Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: manda

customer_reviews.title: Definitely an A+++ Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I bought it and will continue to buy it. I use it all over my body but specially on my face. The redness in my face have disappear and my skin look so youthful and soft now than ever before. When I apply my makeup now it looks so natural, I guess because my skin has rejuvenated. I am 43 years old and have been receiving compliments at work regarding the appearance of my skin and what I am doing to make my skin look this good. Emu oil is really an amazing product that I will keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Emu Oil is great, wish I found it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the product very much, I have very dry skin in the winter when the humidity drops and the heat goes on in the house and the mall and other places. A little bit goes a long way for me and even my sons use it after shaving as it makes their faces feel great especially in the winter time. May have to order another one soon just for them to use.
customer_reviews.author: Music & Book Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Product is great for the whole family! Great to use on skin, hair and nails! Does wonders for dry skin, dry hair, and cracked feet!
customer_reviews.author: Paula R.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I use it for my skin. Even tho my skin is already very smooth, there are certain areas on my chest & back that aren't. Probably because of the excessive use of hot water. But after rubbing it in those areas after a shower, the next morning I noticed a considerable difference in my skin! It was much smoother and softer. I could probably go without using it daily, but why would I? My only wish is that there were larger sized bottles. I'm about to order my third one!
customer_reviews.author: xbikerchick

customer_reviews.title: I have very bad eczema and from the scratching and frequent use of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have very bad eczema and from the scratching and frequent use of topical steroids, the skin on my forearms is very thin and "brittle". After using this EMU oil every night I have noticed a marked improvement in my skin's elasticity. My nails and cuticles are much healthier as well. I have found that adding a few drops of water OR applying to damp skin helps to smooth it on. This oil IS actual odorless and does not leave a greasy feeling. The company's customer service is incredible. I will be ordering more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: For Eyelash Growth
customer_reviews.text: Been using Emu Oil for my eyelashes for about three months now. I rub the oil between my forefinger, middle finger and thumb, then I spread along my eyelashes-bottom and top. I am so excited to see great growth! Before Emu, My eyelashes were very sparse. They just wouldn't grow. I'm not saying they are luxurious now, but I can Definitly see a difference. Will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great oil for moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to Emu oil. I've been using this as a body moisturizer. It doesn't leave me feeling oily, and it has essentially no smell whatsoever. It's a hit--I like it a lot! update: I'm still a fan! I use this as a skin moisturizer and have found that it is non-oily, and totally eliminates bumps I used to have on my arms, etc. It also lasts a long tine and has no unpleasant odor. Will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Too early to tell, for hair growth
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner. Item does have a slight odour but seems to be good quality. I am unable to give a comprehensive review or attest to its hair-raising properties as I have only just commenced my regimen. I shall add to the review should I see new growth... Thought I'd give emu oil a try as three years of various snake oils haven't worked on my ever-thinning pate. :-(
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Should Be 10 Stars!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Emu oil I have ever purchased!! I use it every day and I see big improvements in my skin! I hurt my ankle a week ago and could barely walk so I grabbed the Emu oil and applied it around my ankle where it was swollen and bruised and by the next day the swelling was way down and the bruising was much better. The pain was almost completely gone!! I was so amazed at the difference it made. I will continue to purchase from this company from now on. A little goes a long way so the bottle will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mari33

customer_reviews.title: A nope for me.
customer_reviews.text: No change. 2 months now. Just greased up skin n scalp. I will Stick to coconut oil and tea tree oil. Basic is key. And you will save money.
customer_reviews.author: Sharita Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not for my skin type at all.
customer_reviews.text: It’s too oily for my skin. It didn’t absorb into my skin for a soft smooth moisturizer. It laid on my skin and I had to wipe it off because it didn’t absorb.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product! I mix it half & half with my lotion, and it becomes the best moisturizer for my very dry hands. I also apply it to my hair, leave it on overnight, then shampoo in the morning. My hair has become so soft and silky. The anti inflammatory properties have helped my achy joints and muscle pains! Don't want to ever be without it! A must-have in my medicine cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Algire

customer_reviews.title: so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few weeks. So far I have noticed some clearing of some dark spots on my face. The odor that some say is so bad has not been an issue. It goes away quickly. Most things that are good for you will either taste or smell odd. I find this with most products that are in a more pure form. I have noticed two blackheads that have popped up on my face, but I will continue to use this oil for 60 days then submit an update.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful purest product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve sent my daughter this on 16 month journey at sea. She has excellent results for her skincare. I keep as a everyday necessary item as it keeps my skin healthy and healing from life exposure.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil! I use it everyday on my hair, face and body. Great moisturizer. I even got my daughter, and my sister hooked on it😊
customer_reviews.author: Paula D

customer_reviews.title: Oil
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok as a moisturizer! Don’t use it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good to protect against side effects from radiation treatment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use during radiation treatment for breast cancer and I believe it helped minimize the effects from radiation. My doctors were unfamiliar with this product but due to the feedback I received from other women and the research that I conducted online, I decided to purchase the product anyway. My doctor did caution against applying this before treatment so I just used it in the evenings after my actual treatment sessions. I'm a fan of oils in general (coconut, argan, etc.) and will consider purchasing argan oil from this company in the future since the price is reasonable and my experience with the emu oil has been good.
customer_reviews.author: LBoogie

customer_reviews.title: ... this in lieu of facial moisturizer for years and love the results
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this in lieu of facial moisturizer for years and love the results.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry D.B.

customer_reviews.title: The best emu oil that I have purchase and highly recommend ...
customer_reviews.text: The best emu oil that I have purchase and highly recommend it. I would know because I tried another brand on Amazon because it was selling for a good price and it was 8 oz. But turn out to be so thick and heavy that I started to get break out. This 100% emu oil by Instanatural is very light and soaked into my skin without leaving it greasy or oily. I normal use it in the spring, fall and summer because it is so light on my face ( replace my face cream) and body.
customer_reviews.author: Boundheart

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job of moisturizing the skin and works great on my sensitive skin. I use it on my face and also my fingertips that get particularly dry and cracked. No weird smell and works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Yu

customer_reviews.title: Best Product EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I use it everyday. This is the best product ever. My skin looks amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Emu Oil - AEA Certified Pure Moisturizer for Strengthened Hair, Stretch Marks, Scars, Joint & Muscle Pain - For Body, Skin, Eyes, Face & Nails - Essential Beauty Product - InstaNatural - 4 oz
feature_bullets: ALL-NATURAL BENEFITS - Natural oils are the secret to achieving full-body hydration. InstaNatural's Emu Oil offers unmatched organic relief for skin irritation conditions located anywhere from your face, back, neck or legs, or even more sensitive spots like the eye or lip areas. It easily helps reduce dryness, redness, itching, marks or sunburn.

PROMOTES HEALTHY APPEARANCE OF HAIR - Research has shown that Emu Oil works wonders on dry or damaged hair. For both men and women looking for healthier-looking locks, this liquid adds luster and shine when used after your shampoo or conditioner.

EASES MILD PAIN & DISCOMFORT - While Emu Oil has been proven to reduce the appearance of blemishes, it has also been shown to help people just feel better overall with simple application to certain areas of the body. This organic oil can be used for general joint pain, easing sore or aching muscles, or anything associated with sprains or almost any type of burn.
